#text=I decided to take the train to New York City with a friend to see a show and eat at some nice restaurants .
#text=First I checked the Amtrak schedule on-line to see when trains were leaving Union Station in Washington , D.C. to go to New York .
#text=Once I had picked out the time that suited me , I bought the tickets on-line and printed them out at home .
#text=My friend and I took a cab to Union Station and went to the ticket window with our pre-printed tickets .
#text=We waited for our train to come , and once it did we got on and got seated .
#text=The train ride was very relaxing and was a very fast way to get to New York City .
#text=We enjoyed lunch while we were riding .
#text=Once the train arrived at Grand Central Station in New York City we got off and hailed a cab to get to our hotel .
